Title: Band Candy
Plot: Mr Trick enlists Giles' old buddy Ethan Rayne to manufacture and distribute boxes of candy which turn the adult population into uninhibited, irresponsible teenagers to keep them out of the way while the mysterious Mayor Wilkins pays a tribute to a demon.
GuestStars: Peg Stewart, Robin Sachs, Kristine Sutherland, K. Todd Freeman, Harry Groener, Armin Shimerman
